articles.author: Graeme Culliford
articles.title: Diplomat's wife who inspired "The Serpent" turned detective to help cage serial killer - Mirror Online
articles.description: EXCLUSIVE: Angela Knippenberg believes the drama underplays her role in helping to convict Charles Sobhraj who murdered at least 12 people in the 1970s in South-East Asia
articles.content:
Husband and wife sleuths sifted through a serial ­killers flat and found the possessions of people who would later turn up dead.
They were in the lair of a ­monster known as The Serpent and the evid… [+6828 chars]

articles.title: Which scenes from Netflix's No.1 show were filmed in Kent? - Kent Online
articles.description: We take a look at which parts of a new period drama, now streaming on Netflix, were filmed in the county.
articles.content:
